text: The Mpwapwa wedge-snouted worm lizard (Geocalamus modestus) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==References== Category:Geocalamus Category:Reptiles described in 1880 Category:Taxa named by Albert Günther Category:Endemic fauna of Tanzania Category:Reptiles of Tanzania
title: Mpwapwa wedge-snouted worm lizard
